name: Apply Full Upgrade
description: checks if there are updates available. If there are it opnes notifier.py which is a window that notifies about package updates available. If you decide to upgrade a full upgrade (not safe-upgrade) with the upgrader binary. Upgrader can also be run alone, it can be chosen to run cache update before and if a safe or full upgrade will be done. There is also a .desktop to call upgrader with cache update and a full upgrade.
